segments.text: I'm trying to make sense of all the activity in this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water pouring from the sink is just such a wasteful sight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's making a real mess of the cabinets and the floor below.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's inability to notice it is frankly quite irritating to witness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't imagine being so preoccupied that I miss a flood right at my feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then, there are these children, making their own kind of mess and rule-breaking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is practically tumbling off that stool for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His grabby hand in the jar and the girl's eager anticipation are typical, but risky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's just an overall picture of domestic disarray and lack of supervision.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The potential for a slip or a fall is very high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone could get really hurt because of all this carelessness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a frustrating scene, seeing so many avoidable problems converging.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole situation just seems so out of control, yet nobody seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is not how a well-managed household should operate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It just feels wrong on so many levels.
segments.speaker: PAR
